artist: Painter: Jean Etienne Liotard; Lithographer: Gustav Wolff
description: half length portrait of Maurice, Marshal of Saxe facing left and looking out at viewer; left hand on baton; right hand on crown; battle in right distance
inscription:
Signature,Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Gemalt von Jean Etienne Liotard   Lithogr von G. Wolff in Dresden/ GRAF MARITZ VON SACHSEN./ (Dresdener Galerie) / 80  |  on sheet in pencil: 1-661
title: Portrait of Graf Moritz von Sachsen
